description: Set of values obtained from the meter.
comment: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models

contents.name: isCoincidentTrigger
contents.comment: If true, this meter reading is the meter reading for which other coincident meter readings are requested or provided.

contents.name: valuesInterval
contents.comment: Date and time interval of the data items contained within this meter reading.
